trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around August 5th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my adult son were walking home from neighborhood Walmart. As we were heading for the crosswalk to my right a very bright,very brilliant pulsating ball? orb? it seemed solid. At first I thought it was a helicopter because it seemed about the altitude one would be if it were landing at North Bay Medical Center which is about 2 miles NE and about 2 miles NW is Travis Air Force Base that also has a Medical Center from where we were standing when first spotted. I made my son stop because it was just so bright. We stood and watched it for 6-7 minutes but it did not seem to move, but I could be wrong. What we did notice is that it did not have any observable exterior lights. No blinking, or flashing lights no search light. You know when you look up at one of the planets with your naked eye, how it flickers and gets bright then dim then bright? It was something like that. There was also no sound that we noticed. I was kinda getting scared that it might be an asteroid or other object burning up. But it did not seem to move. I tried to take video with my android phone device 1 block away from Walmart going towards our home but it would not pick it up so I use the same device but the camera app and took about 9 stills. By the time we were half way home it was out of our line of vision.
Summary: walking home from Walmart I noticed a very bright light low in the sky.almost like a star pulsated from amber to deep red then back.
